scripts.comment sites: siteA:dev -starts local server, siteA:build -creates site at public/
scripts.comment deploy: deploy:dev:project1 -upload to dev server all sites in public/project1
scripts.deploy:dev:project1: cd public/project1 && firebase use multisite-hosting-dev && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:prod:project1: cd public/project1 && firebase use multisite-hosting && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:dev:project2: cd public/project2 && firebase use multisite-hosting-2-dev && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:prod:project2: cd public/project2 && firebase use multisite-hosting-2 && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run deploy:dev:project1 && npm run deploy:dev:project2
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:prod:project1 && npm run deploy:prod:project2
